response.overview: Ancestry is a powerful documentary that explores how Two Nigerian Communities Protect Sacred Pythons and Biodiversity from Extinction. The Idemili and Osogbo communities in Nigeria protect sacred pythons and their surrounding biodiversity through indigenous knowledge and spiritual traditions. This film sheds light on the deep connection between culture, conservation, and heritage, revealing how these communities have safeguarded their environment for generations. Ancestry challenges mainstream narratives on wildlife protection, offering a decolonized perspective on African conservation efforts.
response.title: Ancestry
